item.title: My Problem with Apple
item.description: Note This post is not ment as “Apple should go to hell”, it’s an explination for “why don’t you like Apple”. There’s a lot of stuff that Apple does do a good job on - have you seen the M1 Ultra? - but that is not this post. There’s other stuff I don’t like but this is the big ones. Apple stuff only works with other Apple stuff Apple has made itself the Apple ecosystem.

item.title: Locked out of my Discord
item.description: Info I got back in. Thanks dad! So Discord locked me out. I was just going about my buisness, then I’m hit with a page that just says “something is going on here”. It forces me to verify a phone number. The only phone numbers I have are landline or VOIP. Which conveniently, Discord doesn’t allow for phone numbers. I’ll be off Discord until I can sort this out.

item.title: Privacy on userexe.me
item.description: Warning This page is not a privacy policy. I’m not making any commitments, this might be out-of-date without notice. I wanted to make this post instead of just a boring hard to understand privacy policy. This post outlines what data I get about you, and what I do with it. Spoiler: not much. üç™ Cookies Probobly the biggest concern that poeple have right off the bat, ohno i don’t like the browser flavor of cookies.

item.title: Sign Language is HARD
item.description: So for school we have to learn sign language, and it’s quite difficult. Like very. I think. We’re using this site called sign school, which tries to make it “fun” but it’s kinda disturbing. Here’s an example: click click click me I’m not sure what it is I just want to see if my rss feed works lol

item.title: Initial Performance Tests
item.description: Took some performance tests from Google’s “Lighthouse” and thought I would share them in the first sorta actual post on this site. Mobile: click me Desktop: click me too

My Projects Duckers Duckers is a simple Discord bot that does pretty simple things: type /quack and get a duck! Duckers was made to modal my random-d.uk Autocode intigration (still WiP). Learn more: Duckers (outdated) website Duckers Autocode intigration Duckers on top.gg Duckers on bot.gg Suggestionator Suggestionator is my WiP Discord bot with the goal of being the most uber-customizable suggestions bot.

item.title: About Me
item.description: üëã Hi, I’m Dominic! I’m a bit of an idiot/crazy person, trying to learn development and get good grades at the same time. We’ll see how that goes.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Note: a confirmation page should appear when your message is successfully sent, if the page just reloads the captcha was invalid (try again and make sure to check the "I'm not a robot" box). Submit

item.description: This page has been removed Sorry. I’ve removed this page as it really isn’t needed and was just taking up valuable menu space.

item.title: What I'm Using
item.description: Hardware Notebook/only computer: Acer Chromebook Spin 11 I also have an ipad 9th gen Software OS: Debian 11 “bookworm” DE: xfce (trying to change to gnome soon) Browser: Google Chrome Editor: VS Code Languages: just node.js for now This site (full post soon): hugo + coder + utterances + github + netlify Some links above are affiliate links :)
